mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(id, locationNo, category, date, title, content, history) VALUES(#{id}, #{locationNo}, #{category}, now(), #{title}, #{content}, #{history})
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.id, b.locationNo, date_format(b.date,'%Y-%m-%d') date, b.title, b.content, l.locationName FROM Board b INNER JOIN Location l ON b.locationNo = l.locationNo WHERE b.category = 2 ORDER BY boardNo DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{to}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Board WHERE category=2
